name: Fallout: The Frontier
description: Fallout: The Frontier is a gigantic DLC/New Game Modification for Fallout New Vegas. As the “Courier” you start a new adventure centered around a conflict between the NCR and the Legion in the snow blasted remains of Portland Oregon. Featuring 3 major questlines, 60+ side quests, hundreds of new armours, weapons and items, and tens of thousands of lines of new voiced dialogue!
